what-p.en: CrypTools is an organisation who tries to deliver the best versions of ciphers and hash functions. Basically, we provide multiple ways of encrypting messages in various programming languages. All our snippets / piece of code are licensed using the MIT License, which make it easy for you to integrate the best of modern cryptography into your next creation. The point of this is to help everyone being more productive. Because we truly believe that we can make the world ğŸŒ a better place.
